item.title: Change a object into some other object
item.dc:creator: @Ketsjoep Ketsjoep
item.description:
@Ketsjoep wrote:

Is there a way to change the object that is in the server like a door, into another door? I want to change object 3017 into object 1530 when the server starts, not when you try to open/close it.

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 08:16:29 AM[/size][hr]Ok, where do I put this code, or how do I change it so it works:

if objectID=3014
{
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,1530, 0);
}

Read full topic
